commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
import { Image, Text, TouchableOpacity, View } from "react-native"
import { useSelector } from "react-redux"

const Screen3 = () => {
    const view =useSelector(state=>state.reducer)
    return(
        <View>
            <View style={{backgroundColor: '#33907C', flex: 1}}></View>
            <Image source={view.nen2}/>
            <View style={{backgroundColor: 'white', flex: 1}}>
              <Text>{view.text3}</Text>
              <Image source={view.mid}/>
              <TouchableOpacity style={{backgroundColor: '#33907C', borderRadius: 20}}>
                  <Text>Next</Text>
              </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}

export default Screen3
